actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of J.L. Simmons Company, Inc., of Champaign, Illinois.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a sum of money, to be determined by the United States Court of Federal Claims, to J.L.Simmons Company, Inc. in full satisfaction of all claims of J.L. Simmons, J.L. Simmons Company, Inc., or any of its subcontractors against the United States for any litigation expenses, and any interest, due and owing to them and not otherwise recoverable at law, on account of the construction of the Veterans Administration (West Side) Hospital in Chicago, Illinois, during the period of 1949 through 1954, and any resulting litigation of claims.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of J.L. Simmons Company, Inc., of Champaign, Illinois.
